name: Spartakids
description:
Spartakids is a 3d Action Co-op boss battle game. You and 1 friend team up to defeat the enemy boss! You can use a sword, or a bow, but be warned, after each boss phase your weapons will swap! You must make it to the dome of safety in order to claim a new perk to amplify your abilities, or even trade your perks with your teammate! Good luck, and see if you can beat the boss!

This was made for the Ubisoft Game Lab Competition from one of Champlain College's teams. 

Team - 

Isabella King - Character Artist

Alina Coffey - UI and Prop Artist

Camden Emery - Animation Artist

Michael Bowen - Gameplay Programmer

Patrick Fagan - Networking Programmer

Benjamin Linden - Systems Designer

Colton Lambert - Narrative Designer and Product Owner

Thomas Charlton - Producer / Scrum Master
